title: CheapTickets â€“ Hotels, Flights, Events
summary: Earn CheapCash on select flights. Plus, hotels, cars, packages and activities!
description: DOWNLOAD AND SAVE! Save an extra $25 on select hotels on your first app booking when you use promo code 25MOBILE. Just book by 12/31/17 and travel by12/31/17 for 2 nights or longer. *See full terms at: https://www.cheaptickets.com/g/rf/mobile25-25-coupon-termsThe CheapTickets app for Android offers the ability to search and securely book the same selection of cheap flights, hotel rooms, rental cars and activities offered on CheapTickets.com. Plus, join our CheapCash loyalty program and start earning CheapCash on select flight bookings that you can instantly apply toward hotels in the app!  Use our convenient travel tools to view upcoming trip details, access address information and get maps for directions, receive alerts for flight delays, gate changes, hotel check-out times and more.  You can also find last-minute hotel rooms nearby and save 40% with mobile exclusive hotel rooms! CheapTickets offers a simple, secure booking process, and 24x7 customer support.
descriptionHTML:
DOWNLOAD AND SAVE! Save an extra $25 on select hotels on your first app booking when you use promo code 25MOBILE. Just book by 12/31/17 and travel by12/31/17 for 2 nights or longer. *See full terms at: https://www.cheaptickets.com/g/rf/mobile25-25-coupon-terms

The CheapTickets app for Android offers the ability to search and securely book the same selection of cheap flights, hotel rooms, rental cars and activities offered on CheapTickets.com. Plus, join our CheapCash loyalty program and start earning CheapCash on select flight bookings that you can instantly apply toward hotels in the app! Use our convenient travel tools to view upcoming trip details, access address information and get maps for directions, receive alerts for flight delays, gate changes, hotel check-out times and more. You can also find last-minute hotel rooms nearby and save 40% with mobile exclusive hotel rooms! CheapTickets offers a simple, secure booking process, and 24x7 customer support.
comments: NEVER BOOK HOTELS WITH CHEAPTICKETS!! My hotel was cancelled for no reason and customer care didn't seem to care. I called multiple times and they just didn't fix the issue. Maybe cheap is not always good...

When booking a ticket the app skip the travelers information input section and just automatically fill in the information for the account holder and that cost me $750 usd and cheap ticket didn't showed any empathy to my situation and I'm a long time customer! But it shows ypu cheap isnt good I will not be using this site nor app for future use
Cannot say how much this app is helpful for cheap travelers like myself.
recentChanges: We squashed a few bugs and made other general usability improvements to further increase performance.
Love the app? Think we can improve? Leave us a review and let us know!
